topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Installing Required Patches for the Memphis Deployment

section.title: Deploy the Horizon Switcher patch
section.p: You should have downloaded HCG2.0_Horizon002_Patch009 during the prerequisites. Extract the horizon-region-switcher.patch and readme files.

To deploy the patch:
Copy the patch file to ~/ on the lifecycle manager.
Change to the kenobi-node-configuration directory:cd ~/kenobi-node-configuration
Execute the following command to install the patch patch -p1 < ../horizon-region-switcher.patch
Change to the ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build directory cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.shWhen you execute the hlm generate command is executed, the changes will be included.

body.p:
If you are using DCN 3.2R4, do not install this patch. Only deployments using HPE DCN 3.2R7 need to install this patch. The instructions below are applicable for pre-cloud deployment
Copy the NEU-DCNR7-PREDEPLOY-HCG-1746.patch to the ~/ location on the lifecycle manager.
Update the kenobi-node-configuration file cd ~/kenobi-node-configuration patch -p1 < ../NEU-DCNR7-PREDEPLOY-HCG-1746.patch
Run the following command:cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build ./hlm_prepare_env.sh
Copy the configobj-5.0.5.tar.gz and nuage-openstack-upgrade-1859.tar.gz files to the /root/dcn folder in the lifecycle manager VM.
